trans-unit.source: Represents an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> digital signatur.

trans-unit.source: For more information about signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] packages, see Chapter 10 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om signatur definitioner i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] paket, finns i kapitel 10 i XML Paper Specification (XPS) tillgänglig för hämtning på [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> digital signatures, see the MSDN article Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
trans-unit.target: Information om <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>digitala signaturer finns i MSDN-artikeln Framework för Digital signering av Open Packaging Conventions finns på [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: For information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Information om [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] finns XML Paper Specification (XPS) tillgänglig för hämtning på [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> of the signature.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>för signaturen.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The Culture property is optional.
trans-unit.target: Kultur-egenskapen är valfri.

trans-unit.source: The cultural information of the signature.
trans-unit.target: Signaturen kulturell information.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unwritten property changes exist for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref> class and must be written to the package's stream.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om det finns ändringar i unwritten egenskaper för den <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"> </xref> klassen och måste skrivas till paketets dataström.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if uncommitted changes exist; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om ändringar som inte finns. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string value of the signature intention agreement that the signer is signing against.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger strängvärdet för signaturen avsikt avtalet undertecknarens loggar mot.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `Intent` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om den `Intent` element i signatur definitioner i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] paket, finns i kapitlet 10 i den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] -specifikationen som du kan hämta på [XPS: specifikation och licens hämtar](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the intention agreement; for example, "I have read and agree."
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som representerar avsikt avtalet; till exempel "Jag har läst och accepterar."</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identity of the person who is requested to sign (or has signed) the package.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger identiteten för den person som krävs för att signera (eller har undertecknat) paketet.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the `SignerName` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen som motsvarar den `SignerName` attribut för den `SignatureDefinition` element i en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] paketet.

trans-unit.source: Notice the difference in the names.
trans-unit.target: Observera skillnaden i namn.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SignerName` attribute, see chapter 10 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om den `SignerName` attribut, finns i kapitel 10 i den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] -specifikationen som du kan hämta på [XPS: specifikation och licens hämtar](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the signer, for example, "Mary Jones, Marketing Dept."
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som representerar undertecknare, till exempel "Mary Jones, marknadsföring Avd."</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date and time by which the requested signer must sign the parts of the specified document.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger det datum och tidpunkt som begärd Signerare måste logga delar av det angivna dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SignBy` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om den `SignBy` element i signatur definitioner i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] paket, finns det [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] -specifikationen som du kan hämta på [XPS:-specifikationen och licens hämtar](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A (<xref:System.Nullable>) <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the deadline by which the signer must sign the package.
trans-unit.target: A (<xref:System.Nullable>) <xref:System.DateTime>som representerar den tidsgräns som undertecknarens måste signera paketet.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Nullable>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the legal jurisdiction where the package is signed.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den juridiska behörigheten där paketet är signerat.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the `SigningLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen som motsvarar den `SigningLocation` element i signatur definitioner i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] paket.

trans-unit.source: Notice the difference in the names.
trans-unit.target: Observera skillnaden i namn.

trans-unit.source: The original producer of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package can set this property.
trans-unit.target: Den ursprungliga tillverkaren av den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] paketet kan använda den här egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the signer can set the property at the time of signing the package if no one else has already signed.
trans-unit.target: Du kan också ange undertecknarens egenskapen vid tidpunkten för signeringen av paketet om ingen annan har redan registrerat.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SigningLocation` element, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om den `SigningLocation` element, se kapitel 10 i den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] -specifikationen som du kan hämta på [XPS: specifikation och licens hämtar](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the jurisdiction, for example, "State of Utah, United States."
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som representerar behörigheten, till exempel "tillstånd Utah, USA."</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger en unik identifierare för den här <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To link a `Signature` element to this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition>, you must set the `Id` attribute of the `Signature` to the value of the SpotId property.
trans-unit.target: Länka en `Signature` element till den här <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition>, måste du ange den `Id` attribut för den `Signature` till värdet för egenskapen SpotId.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition>

trans-unit.source: For more information about `Signature` elements, see the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om `Signature` element, finns det [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SpotID` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om den `SpotID` attribut för den `SignatureDefinition` element i en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] paketet, finns i kapitlet 10 i den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] -specifikationen som du kan hämta på [XPS: specifikation och licens hämtar](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A (<xref:System.Nullable>) <xref:System.Guid> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the signature definition.
trans-unit.target: A (<xref:System.Nullable>) <xref:System.Guid>som representerar den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] signatur för definition.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Nullable>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location that specifies where to display the visible digital signature in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den plats som anger var du vill visa den digitala signaturen som är synliga i en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SpotLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om den `SpotLocation` element i signatur definitioner i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] paket, finns i kapitlet 10 i den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] -specifikationen som du kan hämta på [XPS: specifikation och licens hämtar](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.SpotLocation"></xref> that represents the location in the package where a visible request for a signature appears.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.SpotLocation"> </xref> som representerar en plats i paketet där en synlig begäran om en signatur visas.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
